Antenna to set: None(0), LNAH(1), LNAL(2), LNAW(3) for RX None(0), BAND1(1), BAND(2), NONE(3) for TX

memberdef.argsstring: (int device_number, bool direction, int channel, unsigned gain_dB)
memberdef.name: set_gain

detaileddescription.para: Set the combined gain value in dB This function computes and sets the optimal gain values of various amplifiers that are present in the device based on desired gain value in dB.

simplesect.para: actual gain depends on LO frequency and analog LPF configuration and resulting output signal level may be different when those values are changed

parameterdescription.para: Device number from the list of LMS_GetDeviceList.

memberdef.argsstring: (int device_number, bool direction, int channel, float nco_freq)
memberdef.name: set_nco

detaileddescription.para: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.

parameterdescription.para: Device number from the list of LMS_GetDeviceList.

detaileddescription.para: Disables LimeSDR boards DC corrections

Set TCXO DAC.
Care must be taken as this parameter is returned to default value only after power off.
LimeSDR-Mini default value is 180 range is [0,255] LimeSDR-USB default value is 125 range is [0,255] LimeSDR-PCIe default value is 134 range is [0,255] LimeNET-Micro default value is 30714 range is [0,65535]
device_number
Device number from the list of LMS_GetDeviceList.
dacVal
DAC value (0-65535)

Sets up LimeRFE device pointer so that automatic channel configuration could be made
rfe_dev
Pointer to LimeRFE device descriptor
Assigns configured LimeSDR channels to LimeRFE for automatic channel switching
